originalText.text: Amazing place clean great people just do not make any friends :) Cant trust no one.. But the staff and maintenance people are friendly... Nothing else is perfect any where but i rather live here i so love my opinion.

text.text: Amazing place clean great people just do not make any friends :) Cant trust no one.. But the staff and maintenance people are friendly... Nothing else is perfect any where but i rather live here i so love my opinion.

originalText.text: Management is cordial, place is visually clean, maintenance is friendly, I would consider to live & work here. Many different cultures & personalities in the area. Its not out the way from the train station, you can easily get on the bus. There really is no complaints from myself.

originalText.text: I asked a question. About my Grand Aunty. Who is a Pillar in the Community. They made no inquiry to check on her. Make sure she's ok not deceased in her apt. God forbid they take my number down give it to her. In case of emergency very unprofessional. Some people don't believe in family sadly.

text.text: I asked a question. About my Grand Aunty. Who is a Pillar in the Community. They made no inquiry to check on her. Make sure she's ok not deceased in her apt. God forbid they take my number down give it to her. In case of emergency very unprofessional. Some people don't believe in family sadly.

originalText.text:
My mother has lived here for over 40years.  On March 13 housing was going to install new cabinets, they found a gigantic hole on the wall when they removed the old cabinet. They said they had to fix the wall before installing the new cabinet. Today is April 3rd,  we still have the hole on the wall covered with a piece if wood, a substitute sink and not a word on when they will fix the problem.
My mother is 87 years old. How do they expect her to deal with this situation?
No consideration at all.

originalText.text: They stop giving heat in some of the Vladeck buildings . They would give heat for 2 hours and cut the heat for the rest of the day . This is happening since last winter 2018 and now is happening again 2019 and now is worse since we have this covid19 situation . No hot water and heat .
